name: umbraco-ai-monorepo
description: Root package for Umbraco.Ai frontend development

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:prompt && npm run build:agent && npm run build:copilot
scripts.watch: concurrently --names "core,prompt,agent,copilot" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta" "npm run watch:core" "npm run watch:prompt" "npm run watch:agent" "npm run watch:copilot"
scripts.generate-client: concurrently --names "core,prompt,agent" -c "blue,green,yellow" "npm run generate-client:core" "npm run generate-client:prompt" "npm run generate-client:agent"
